thread.title: Cubs put squeeze on Cardinals, even NLDS with 6-3 win
thread.title_full: Cubs put squeeze on Cardinals, even NLDS with 6-3 win

title: Cubs put squeeze on Cardinals, even NLDS with 6-3 win
text:
> Top News Cubs put squeeze on Cardinals, even NLDS with 6-3 win Chicago Cubs starting pitcher Kyle Hendricks (28) walks off the field after being taken out during the fifth inning of Game 2 in baseball's National League Division Series against the St. Louis Cardinals, Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015, in St. Louis. (AP Photo/Charles Rex Arbogast) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
